titleInfo.title: Tracing showing the proposed site for a consulate at Ahwaz

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on tracing paperDimensions:200 x 327 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Tracing attached to a letter dated 9 February 1909 (folio 125). Shows land near the KƒÅrun River at Ahwaz with proposed site for a consulate. Properties labelled for reference with the approximate position of new buildings indicated by red pecked line and dimensions reported.
